docs.lead_paragraph: PLY some stockbrokers with a few drinks, and soon they'll spill the dirty secret: When it comes to suckers, Wall Street likes nobody better than doctors. As a group, physicians have a lot of disposable income and, for the most part, little knowledge of business.
